mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `name`, `from_cnname` as fromCnName, `to_cnname` as toCnName, `from_enname` as fromEnName, `to_enname` as toEnName, `description` FROM `cmdb_reltype` WHERE id = #{value}

SELECT `id`, `name`, `from_cnname` as fromCnName, `to_cnname` as toCnName, `from_enname` as fromEnName, `to_enname` as toEnName, `description`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cmdb_rel rel WHERE rel.type_id = a.id) AS invokeCount FROM `cmdb_reltype` a ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cmdb_reltype (id, name, from_cnname, to_cnname, from_enname, to_enname, description) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{fromCnName}, #{toCnName}, #{fromEnName}, #{toEnName}, #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE cmdb_reltype SET name=#{name}, from_cnname = #{fromCnName}, to_cnname = #{toCnName}, from_enname = #{fromEnName}, to_enname = #{toEnName}, description = #{description} WHERE id = #{id}
